Hey all, <@U26DA9CQ0> and I are curious about the red highlights that pop up on some of these HTML elements even though alert in the bottom left says there are no errors?  We thought it might have to do with using a hubL loop, but any further info would be appreciated, thanks!
Yeah what <@UAWAFM8QK> said.
I've run into this as well, I think its the HubL simply breaking the editor check when looking for closing tags
is it still there when you remove the HubL?
It’s definitely that loop that’s angering the linter
It still saves so it isn’t hampering us.
<@UAWAFM8QK> From your screenshot, it looks like you have an open `<span>` tag on line 9

** every day***
When I first started out with HubSpot I spent 1.5 days scratching my head before figuring out that you shouldn’t add a class to the COS module with the period before it.
I was able to removed the time by changing the hubl markup but this is a great option too! Thank you so much Chad.
